name: product-page

productData.name: High Rise Vintage Flare Jeans With Washwell&#153

bulletAttributes: With Low Stretch. Feels like vintage denim, with just a touch of stretch. Snug at first, but forms to your shape.

Better denim. Better planet. This pair of denim is part of our water-saving Washwell&#153 program. Compared to conventional wash methods, Washwell&#153 has saved millions of liters of water since 2016.

fitInformation.label: Fit & Sizing
attributes: The High Rise is an 11 inch rise that's cut to hit above the hips. Looks good from every single angle.

This new 70's-inspired vintage flare is a modern update to the traditional tighter-fitting flare. Made wide enough at the bottom to cover the shaft of a boot, this style is more relaxed and tomboyish than its predecessor.
The flare leg shape starts to ease out a couple of inches above the knee for a much more relaxed leg.
Straight across the hip, with a full inseam length that delivers a long, leg-extending fit.

productData.productTitle: High Rise Vintage Flare Jeans With Washwell&#153

title: High Rise Vintage Flare Jeans With Washwell&#153 | Gap
description: Shop Gap's High Rise Vintage Flare Jeans With Washwell&#x26;#153: With Low Stretch. Feels like vintage denim, with just a touch of stretch. Snug at first, but forms to your shape., High waisted., Medium indigo wash., Button-closure, zip-fly., Classic five-pocket styling., Better denim. Better planet. This pair of denim is part of our water-saving Washwell&#153 program. Compared to conventional wash methods, Washwell&#153 has saved millions of liters of water since 2016.
